entities.name: west tower
entities.description: The West Tower is mentioned as a location where Harry and Hermione are hiding. It is described as being to the right of the West Tower.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who is with Harry in the story. She is mentioned as whispering and holding onto Harry as they fly away on Buckbeak.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is with Hermione in the story. He is mentioned as staring through the darkness and recognizing Macnair.

entities.name: macnair
entities.description: Macnair is an executioner who is coming out of the castle. Harry recognizes him and realizes that he has gone to get the dementors.

entities.name: buckbeak
entities.description: Buckbeak is a hippogriff who is being ridden by Harry. He is described as soaring into the dark air with Harry and Hermione on his back.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: The dementors are mentioned as being at the castle. Macnair has gone to get them, which suggests that they are a threat to Harry and Hermione.

relationships.description: Harry is riding Buckbeak as they fly away from the castle. This relationship is described in the text as Harry giving Buckbeak a leg up and then climbing onto his back.
Harry is carrying Hermione on his back as they fly away from the castle. This relationship is described in the text as Harry giving her a leg up and then holding onto her around the waist.

Macnair has gone to get the dementors, which suggests that he is fetching them for some purpose. This relationship is described in the text as Harry realizing that Macnair has gone to get the dementors.
